description.brazilian: Alcançar o limite do ponto médio.
description.french: Atteindre la limite du point central.
description.spanish: Alcanzar el límite del punto medio.

description.brazilian: Chegar aos créditos acreditando no Paraíso.
description.english: Reach the credits while believing in Paradise.
description.french: Atteindre le générique de fin en croyant en le Paradis.
description.german: Erreiche den Abspann, während man an das Paradies glaubt.
description.japanese: 楽園を信じたルートでエンドロール
description.koreana: 낙원을 믿은 루트로 엔드롤 볼 수 있음
description.schinese: 相信乐园的路线看到了结尾字幕
description.spanish: Llegar a los créditos creyendo en el Paraíso.
description.tchinese: 相信樂園的路線看到了結尾字幕

description.brazilian: Chegar aos créditos sem acreditar no Paraíso.
description.english: Reach the credits without believing in Paradise.
description.french: Atteindre le générique de fin sans croire au Paradis.
description.german: Erreiche den Abspann ohne an das Paradies zu glauben.
description.japanese: 楽園を信じないルートでエンドロール
description.koreana: 낙원을 믿지 않은 루트로 엔드롤 볼 수 있음
description.schinese: 不相信乐园的路线看到了结尾字幕
description.spanish: Llegar a los créditos sin creer en el Paraíso.
description.tchinese: 不相信樂園的路線看到了結尾字幕

description.brazilian: Colecionar todos as cartas de Espadachim.
description.french: Collecter toutes les cartes de l'épéiste.
description.spanish: Coleccionar todas las cartas de Espadachín.

description.brazilian: Colecionar todos as cartas de Magia.
description.french: Collecter toutes les cartes de magie.
description.spanish: Coleccionar todas las cartas de Magia.

description.brazilian: Colecionar todos as cartas de Inimigos.
description.japanese: エネミーカードを全部コンプ
description.spanish: Coleccionar todas las cartas de Enemigos.

displayName.english: All The Children of The Tower
displayName.french: Tous les enfants de la tour
displayName.spanish: Todos los hijos de la torre

description.brazilian: Colecionar todos as cartas de Crianças.
description.french: Collecter toutes les cartes pour enfants.
description.japanese: 子らのカードを全部コンプ
description.schinese: 孩子们的卡牌全部收集
description.spanish: Coleccionar todas las cartas de Niños.
description.tchinese: 孩子們的卡牌全部收集

description.brazilian: Desbloquear todas as bênçãos na comuna.
description.english: Unlock all the blessings in the commune.
description.french: Débloquer toutes les bénédictions de la communauté.
description.japanese: 全ての集落祝福をコンプ
description.schinese: 所有聚落的祝福完全收集
description.spanish: Desbloquear todas las bendiciones en el pueblo.
description.tchinese: 所有聚落的祝福完全收集

description.brazilian: Alcançar o número máximo de links em um ataque encadeado.
description.english: Reach the maximum number of links in a chain attack.
description.french: Obtenir le nombre maximum de liens dans une attaque en chaîne.
description.german: Erziele die maximale Anzahl von Links in einer Kettenattacke.
description.japanese: 物理カードの連撃MAXを達成
description.koreana: 물리 카드의 연속 공격이 MAX에 도달한다
description.spanish: Alcanzar el número máximo de enlaces en un ataque en cadena.

description.brazilian: Lançar um feitiço de magia totalmente carregado.
description.english: Unleash a fully charged magic spell.
description.french: Libérer un sort de magie entièrement chargé.
description.japanese: 魔法カードのチャージMAXを達成
description.spanish: Liberar un hechizo mágico completamente cargado.

description.brazilian: Libertar o verdadeiro poder divino com uma corrente máxima de selo de comprimento.
description.english: Unleash the true power of the divine with a maximum length seal chain.
description.french: Libérer la véritable puissance divine avec une chaîne de sceau de longueur maximale.
description.german: Entfessle die wahre Kraft des Göttlichen mit einer maximal langen Siegel-Kette.
description.japanese: 神技カードの繋ぎMAXを達成
description.spanish: Desatar el verdadero poder divino con una cadena de sello de longitud máxima.

description.brazilian: Ver todos os segredos da comuna.
description.english: Check out all of the secrets in the commune.
description.french: Découvrir tous les secrets de la communauté.
description.german: Entdecke alle Geheimnisse in der Gemeinde.
description.japanese: 集落に隠された全ての解説を見た
description.schinese: 看到了隐藏在聚落的所有解说
description.spanish: Descubrir todos los secretos en el pueblo.
description.tchinese: 看到了隱藏聚落的所有解說

description.brazilian: Ter mais de 100 pães armazenados de uma vez na comuna.
description.english: Go over 100 bread stored at once in the commune.
description.french: Avoir plus de 100 pains stockés à la fois dans la communauté.
description.german: Habe über 100 Brote gleichzeitig in der Gemeinde gelagert.
description.japanese: 集落のパンの所持数が100を超えた
description.schinese: 拥有聚落面包的数量超过100
description.spanish: Tener más de 100 panes almacenados a la vez en el pueblo.
description.tchinese: 擁有聚落麵包的數量超過100
